page.title: 06SCHOOL MEALS SURVEY
page.content: {Thursday 16th May 1985. } Dunton Bassett Primary School No. of children {in school 81 No. of children {going home 16 No. of children with{packed lunch 43 No. of{school dinner children 22 { { * PACKED LUNCH SURVEY * Sandwich fillings-. Cooked meat 3. meat 7. Salad 2. spreads 20. Drink 42. cheese 11. Cake 14. jam 2. Fresh Fruit 12. other 1. Crisps/Nuts 7. ................... Desert 9. Biscuits - choc. 0. other 1. ...................................... { { * HOT MEAL OF THE DAY *} Sausages, spaghetti and chips. Chocolate haystacks.
